Installation

Dependencies

python                   3.9.19
numpy                    1.23.4
scanpy                   1.9.8
squidpy                  1.4.1
anndata                  0.10.6
scikit-learn             1.4.1
networkx                 3.2.1
torch                    2.2.1
torch-geometric          2.5.2
torch-scatter            2.1.2
torch-sparse             0.6.18
torch-spline-conv        1.2.2
graphcompass             0.2.2

These dependencies will be automatically installed along with QueST.

Installation via PyPI

QueST is available on PyPI and can be installed via

pip install quest-spatial
